channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MT
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MT

item.title: Report I-2023060146
item.description:
Report I-2023060146

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-18T15:09:56+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-14
  • City: Missoula
  • State: MT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: REDDAWAY DRIVERS
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: While unloading the trailer, three batteries were found damaged and Ieaking. The release was properly managed. The damaged batteries were placed into a salvage drum and held pending disposition from the shipper.
